name: Capix
headline: Capix automates deal sourcing for IB and PE
description: Capix helps private equity and investment banking professionals discover and enhance company and people profiles. Whether building reach out lists for deal sourcing or creating buyer lists for investment banking, Capix integrates data from multiple sources into a single, customizable platform with advanced filtering.

founders.name: Bruno Jacob, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder of Capix. We automate deal sourcing for IB and PE

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/677d2a76d839dc35bbeacc54/677d704c2fa01b52cfe78e29_typewriter_1.png)
## Leverage AI to discover the hard-to-find.
Finding companies and professionals is inefficient and error-prone. Advanced searches—like “find biotech companies founded in the last four years with a CEO that has a background in molecular biology”—requires piecing together information from fragmented sources across social media, paid databases, and Google. Capix solves these problems by aggregating and enriching data from multiple sources into a single, customizable platform.
## How it works
### [Describe what you're looking forJust type your criteria in plain English—like ‘early-stage biotech startups in Boston that raised Series A in the last 2 years.’ No code or complex queries needed.](http://capix.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)### [Let AI do the restWe take it from here. Capix's army of AI agents search public and private data sources to find the most relevant information, delivering results with full traceability and transparency in minutes.](http://capix.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)### [Enrich on-demandAdd columns to enrich your dataset with up-to-date details like location, funding stage, job history, leadership profiles, or any other information you need.](http://capix.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/677d2a76d839dc35bbeacc54/677e0284a3eb025e6430e1e4_Framefilter484144.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/677d2a76d839dc35bbeacc54/677dec9c8ffe7d5998503296_Framejjjh%20484141.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/677d2a76d839dc35bbeacc54/678db567f6199e502150ee9c_Framefjcjna484144.png)
## Unmatched Coverage for Serious Work
### Public data
Our AI agents scour public data sources across the web. From websites to open databases, Capix ensures you never miss important information.
### Private data
Capix integrates with premium data sources like Pitchbook and other providers to deliver high-quality and comprehensive data in one interface.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/677d2a76d839dc35bbeacc54/677d2a76d839dc35bbeacca5_Frame%2012.svg)
#### Premium Sources
Access to high-quality data from trusted providers.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/677d2a76d839dc35bbeacc54/677d2a76d839dc35bbeacc7e_Frame%2012-1.svg)
#### Full Traceability
Every data point includes transparent and reliable sourcing.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/677d2a76d839dc35bbeacc54/677d2a76d839dc35bbeacc94_Frame%2012-2.svg)
#### Dynamic Filtering
Infinitely flexible criteria to refine your list with ultimate precision.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/677d2a76d839dc35bbeacc54/677d2a76d839dc35bbeacc97_Frame%2012-3.svg)
#### Secure
SOC 2 compliant and enterprise-grade security.
## Your Partner for Every Search
Capix helps you build the perfect list of companies and professionals, from broad searches to highly detailed filters.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/677d2a76d839dc35bbeacc54/678f0405f67a40ca97ac0526_shhhh455.png)
## Enrichment for Every List
From investing to recruiting, Capix adapts to your needs to deliver the perfect list for your use case.
### Recruiting
Build precise candidate pipelines and find top talent faster with enriched profiles.
### Investing
From deal sourcing to buyer list creation, identify high-potential opportunities faster.
### Sales
Generate targeted lead lists to prioritize and close deals more efficiently.
### Research
Simplify research for use cases like competitive intelligence and more.
## Find the ultimate set of people and companies.
Go beyond rigid and narrow filters. Search with an army of AI research analysts at your fingertips.
[Join Waitlist](http://capix.ai/<#>)
Get early access
Thank you! Your submission has been received!
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.
## Frequently Asked Questions
### [What is Capix?](http://capix.ai/<#>)
Capix is a data aggregation and enrichment tool that helps professionals discover and enhance company and people profiles. Whether building sales lists, curating candidate pipelines, or creating buyer lists for investment banking, Capix integrates data from multiple sources into a single, customizable platform with advanced filtering.
### [For what types of companies is Capix for?](http://capix.ai/<#>)
Capix is ideal for companies that rely on precise and comprehensive data to drive their workflows. Whether your focus is recruiting, investing, sales, or conducting in-depth research, Capix streamlines the process of building and refining targeted lists by integrating data from multiple sources into one customizable interface.
### [What common uses can I accomplish with Capix?](http://capix.ai/<#>)
Capix supports a wide range of use cases, empowering teams to build targeted sales lists, curate candidate pipelines for recruiting, identify investment opportunities, conduct competitive intelligence research, and enrich existing data sets.
With Capix, teams can effortlessly build lists using existing CSVs or by sourcing data from multiple public and private sources. They can enrich these lists with advanced data enhancement tools for superior quality and coverage, and leverage AI to extract insights from websites, perform unstructured research, and uncover information that previously required manual effort.

generated_description:
**Capix: Revolutionizing Deal Sourcing Through Automation**

Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's Summer 2022 batch, Capix is making waves in the fintech landscape by automating deal sourcing for private equity (PE) and investment banking (IB). This New York-based startup has a nimble team of five that’s laser-focused on helping finance professionals discover and enhance profiles of companies and individuals. 

**Mission and Offerings**

Capix's mission is straightforward: simplify the often cumbersome process of sourcing deals in the investment landscape. At its core, Capix integrates data from a myriad of sources to create customizable profiles with robust filtering options. Whether you’re generating outreach lists for investment opportunities or compiling buyer lists, Capix acts as a one-stop-shop that merges public and premium data sources seamlessly.

**How It Works**

The platform allows users to describe what they're looking for in plain English, eliminating the need for convoluted code or queries. For instance, an investment banker could simply request "early-stage biotech startups in Boston that raised Series A in the last two years." Capix’s AI agents then conduct thorough searches, presenting results with complete transparency and traceability— all while enriching those results with additional data such as location, funding stage, and leadership profiles.

**Advanced Features and Integrity**

In an age where data can be fragmented and unreliable, Capix promises unmatched coverage. It taps into both public databases and premium data resources like Pitchbook to ensure users have access to high-quality, comprehensive information—all delivered through a user-friendly interface. The security of this data handling is noteworthy, mentioning their compliance with SOC 2 standards, making it a trustworthy option for enterprises.

**Use Cases**

Capix caters to a diverse clientele by supporting various use cases: 
- **Recruiting**: Build targeted pipelines to find top talent quickly.
- **Investing**: Identify high-potential opportunities for investment.
- **Sales**: Create efficient lead lists to close deals faster.
- **Research**: Conduct competitive intelligence with ease.

**Get Involved**

Currently in private beta, Capix invites interested parties to join a waitlist for early access. By sharing specific use cases, potential users can receive tailored search results for free, making it easy and low-risk to try out this innovative tool.

In conclusion, Capix is poised to transform the way finance professionals access and utilize data for deal sourcing. By leveraging advanced AI technologies, they democratize access to comprehensive and actionable insights, enabling smarter decision-making in the fast-paced world of finance. So if you’re in the market for a streamlined approach to finding investment opportunities or enhancing your outreach, keeping an eye on Capix might be worth your while.

For more information, visit [Capix.ai](http://capix.ai/).
